TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {4013=First Finisher John Geesler, 23:08 Mike Morton, 20:21 Courtney Campbell, 18:21 Eric Clifton, 23:03 Ian Torrence, 19:16 Ian Torrence, 20:14 Courtney Campbell, 19:58 Tim Lee, 23:41 Tom Nielsen, 21:55:30 Sean Andrish, 20:49:00 Matthew Estes, 18:12:59 Sim Kae Duk, 17:40:45 Karl Meltzer, 20:11:09 Todd Walker, 20:58:53 Karl Meltzer, 18:29:57 Dan Barger, 20:25:48 Karl Meltzer, 18:18:28 Jason Lantz, 19:33:18 James Blandford, 18:30:53 Karl Meltzer, 18:40:23 Brian Rusiecki, 19:36:25, 965=The MMT course has been generally the same over the years, but there have been many small changes to it. For example, the first MMTs did not have Short Mountain. Kerns Mountain was added even later. On the other hand, the early MMTs had the very tough Waterfall Mountain climb which has not been in later versions of the event. Also, the trail conditions have improved greatly over the years. The course in 2010 and after was significantly changed from prior years in that the start/finish was in a different location. Most of the trails were the same, however. Consequently, these are more properly Event Records not course records. True course records would be very complicated to maintain. We call these "course records" because that is the term commonly, though imprecisely used., 792=Updated through the 2015 Event}
textBeforeTable: Runners with Ten or More Finishes A first regional award was given in 1995 to Joe Clapper, 23:39. The international award began in 1997, but was not given in 2005 and after. The female master award began in 2002. The male master and super senior awards began in 2004. The Stonewall Jackson Division was initiated in 2009 and became the Solo Division in 2011. First International Woman     Monica Scholz, 34:06 First International Gi Schneider, 22:02 Colin Kingsford, 30:31 Aki Inoue, 24:47 Jonathan Worswick, 21:16 Jonathan Worswick, 26:33 Eric Viala, 26:42 Andrew Brooks, 24:54 Hans-Dieter Weisshaar, 29:34 1997 1998 1999 2000 2001 2002 2003 2004 Solo Woman Susan Donnelly, 30:22:13 Jennifer Brunet, 25:52:05 Susan Donnelly, 31:13:04 Eva Pastalkova, 22:01:54 Megan McGrath, 29:26:20 Susan Donnelly, 30:29:13 Susan Donnelly, 30:19:11 Solo Man Keith Knipling, 22:32:48 Matt Davies, 22:30:18 Jeremy Pade, 22:45:19 Jack Pilla, 21:07:36 Jason Lantz, 20:31:55 Pierre Loic Deragne, 19:23:31 Jason Lantz, 21:16:43 2009 2010 2011 2012 2013 2014 2015 First Super Senior Woman Barbara Isom, 31:33:01
